attr.title: SuperDrome Bugs
attr.desc: One day, Simon Pray -- a down-on-his-luck pest exterminator in a strangely pest-free Mexico -- receives a mysterious job offer from a lavish mansion. Something feels off, but Simon doesn't have time for second thoughts. He needs the money.
attr.inst:
You can download SuperDome Bugs for free at: https://pistachoduck.itch.io/superdrome-bugs 

Download the SuperDromerBugs_Linux64.zip version and extract it, and place the SuperDromerBugs_Linux64.pck file in the gamedata directory.
attr.inst_md:
You can download SuperDome Bugs for free at: https://pistachoduck.itch.io/superdrome-bugs 

Download the *SuperDromerBugs\_Linux64.zip* version and extract it, and place the *SuperDromerBugs\_Linux64.pck* file in the gamedata directory.
